value.title: Australian man plans to marry robot after failing to find loving woman
value.excerpt: Australian man wants to marry his expensive AI robot Emma and doesn't want to change anything about their relationship

value.title: Qualcomm and Microsoft collaborate on custom chips for AR glasses
value.excerpt: Qualcomm announced its intentions to integrate software platforms with Microsoft at Tuesday's CES 2022 keynote.

value.title: CES 2022: Bosch tests deep audio AI developed on the ISS to detect asthma
value.excerpt: Doctors will use a high-resolution microphone to record children as they speak and breathe to look for breathing problems.

value.title: Qualcomm aims to serve next-gen cars with Snapdragon Ride Vision and Digital Chassis
value.excerpt: Companies like the Intel's Mobileye, graphics giant Nvidia, and Qualcomm are all using CES 2022 to announce their newest offerings for the automotive industry, as well

value.title: CES 2022: Watch GM's self driving car reveal and more big reveals here
value.excerpt: GM will be kicking off Wednesday's CES day, and you can watch reveals from LG, Samsung and more. CES 2022 is underway, with the convention officially opening in Las Vegas Wednesday along with a digital experience for those who can't make it to the show.

value.title: Restaurant Robotics Shift to Customer-Facing Roles
value.excerpt: As labor challenges persist, restaurants are looking for solutions, and some tech companies are looking to bring robotics into customer-service roles.

value.title: VA Turns to AI to Streamline Administrative Tasks
value.excerpt: The Department of Veterans Affairs is exploring how to use artificial intelligence tools to drive efficiencies in a wide range of medical and clerical areas.

value.title: 2022 Startup Predictions: The Trends, Sectors, And Tech Worth Watching
value.excerpt: Will 2022 be another record year for investment into the European venture community? Here are a few of the trends and technologies likely to drive investment decisions in the year ahead.

value.title: Hong Kong Billionaire Professor Adds $2 Billion To His Wealth As Shares Of AI Giant SenseTime Soar
value.excerpt: Shares of SenseTime have almost doubled since its closely watched IPO last week, adding $2 billion to the net worth of Tang Xiao’ou, cofounder and the largest shareholder of the Chinese AI giant.

value.title: Anker shows off the tiniest 100W charger we’ve ever seen and more at CES 2022
value.excerpt: Anker just announced the 736 Nano II Charger at CES 2022, along with a bunch of other products spanning the projector, webcam, and smart home categories.

value.title: AI startup Fractal becomes unicorn with $360 million investment from TPG
value.excerpt: Fractal has raised $360 million from TPG in a new financing round and entered the unicorn club as the Mumbai and San Francisco-headquartered AI startup, which counts Google and Wells Fargo among its customers,

value.title: Accelerate the in-vehicle digital experience with Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft is helping to reshape the automotive industry in the way it serves its drivers with in-vehicle infotainment systems. Together with the car manufacturers, Microsoft is creating new driving experiences with speech based on the text-to-speech and speech-to-text capabilities within Azure Cognitive

value.title: Bairong Inc. Named in KPMG's China Fintech 50 List for Sixth Consecutive Year
value.excerpt: Bairong Inc. ("Bairong" or "the Company", 6608.HK), a leading independent AI-powered technology platform in China, has been named

value.title: AI could repair the damage done by data overload
value.excerpt: With AI we can start leveraging data to empower connections and enhance problem-solving, collaboration, and finding the answers we need.

value.title: How Incorta uses AI to address supply-chain issues
value.excerpt: With the pandemic slowing down production lines and transportation, the 'supply chain' is regularly in headlines. Incorta hopes to improve it with AI.

value.title: LiLz uses computer vision to read gauges and dials where humans prefer not to tread
value.excerpt: No one wants to be the maintenance worker who has to hike through half a mile of damp hallways just to check the pressure gauge on a valve somewhere. LiLz makes it possible to keep an eye on such inconvenient physical interfaces remotely with a clever and practical application of machine learning.

value.title: Report: 43% of consumers feel transparency is key for positive AI innovations
value.excerpt: With the AI market growing at record rates of adoption, creators must be more explicit about AI's role and the support it provides.

value.title: Ambarella launches 16-core CV3 AI chip for autonomous vehicles
value.excerpt: Ambarella launched its latest CV3 artificial intelligence domain controller family to power autonomous vehicles.

value.title: CES 2022: Roborock S7 MaxV Ultra Solves The Biggest Problem With Robot Mops
value.excerpt: Roborock has finally announced their latest robovac/mop and I couldn't be more excited. As much as I loved the Roborock S7 last year for its improved mopping capabilities and dock compatibility, it lacked the AI obstacle recognition of the S6 MaxV.

value.title: Take advantage of advanced deployment strategies using Amazon SageMaker deployment guardrails
value.excerpt: Deployment guardrails in Amazon SageMaker provide a new set of deployment capabilities allowing you to implement advanced deployment strategies that minimize risk when deploying new model versions on SageMaker hosting. Depending on your use case, you can use a variety of deployment strategies to release

value.title: John Deere’s self-driving tractor arrives later this fall
value.excerpt: The 8R tractor has been in select customers’ hands for “a few seasons” now, according to John Deere. After all, like any kind of autonomous machinery, a self-driving tractor isn’t the kind of thing you just unleash on the world without extensive testing.

value.title: Intel overfloweth with 12th-gen CPUs, Arc discrete GPU at CES 2022
value.excerpt: The company announced roughly 50 CPUs as well as its long-awaited Arc discrete graphics chip. Intel dropped an Acme anvil of 12th-generation ( Alder Lake) processors on us at CES 2022: That's 22 for PCs,

value.title: Pony.ai, Sinotrans Collaborate on Driverless Trucking
value.excerpt: Autonomous driving firm Pony.ai is working with Chinese logistics company Sinotrans to build a smart logistics network that uses autonomous trucking tech.

value.title: NVIDIA RTX 3090 Ti and RTX 3050 revealed to quench your GPU thirst
value.excerpt: With CES kicking off here in the first week of 2022, NVIDIA is joining in on the fun with a few announcements of its own. Chief among those announcements were new RTX 3080 Ti and 3070 Ti mobile

value.title: Train graph neural nets for millions of proteins on Amazon SageMaker and Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibility)
value.excerpt: There are over 180,000 unique proteins with 3D structures determined, with tens of thousands new structures resolved every year. This is only a small fraction of the 200 million known proteins with distinctive sequences. Recent deep learning algorithms such as AlphaFold can accurately predict 3D structures
